item.title: Use Kubeconform to Validate Manifests Locally
item.description: kubeconform is a tool that allows us to validate Kubernetes manifests. Retrieve open API specification from Kubernetes Use this command to retrieve the open API specifications from Kubernetes. k get --raw '/openapi/v2' > /tmp/specs.json Generate JSON schema file Use openapi2jsonschema to generate the JSON schemas. $ python openapi2jsonschema/command.py -o /tmp/json-schemas/v1.
